page.title: 14A TYPICAL FAMILY WEEKEND.
page.content: Friday evening. 18.00 We watch television at Nicola's house. 19.00 We go Roller Skating in the village. 20.00 A Rounders match with our brothers and sisters. 21.00 We watch television and have supper at 21.30. 22.00 We go to bed and Rachel sleeps at Nicola's house. Saturday Morning. 09.30 We wake up and get dressed and have breakfast. 10.00 Prepare packed lunch. 10.30 We go to the Scarborough Water Scene - a swimming pool/leisure centre. 12.00 We get dried and dressed and go for lunch at 12.30. 13.30 We go shopping with our parents.
